content: Collaborate on one or multiple documents with your team

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a description for collaboration rooms in a shared component, typically appearing on a button or dialog related to team document collaboration. It guides users on how to collaborate on one or multiple documents with their team.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Tee yhteistyötä yhden tai useiden dokumenttien luomisessa tiimisi kanssa" is a bit literal and clunky. It translates to "Collaborate on the creation of one or multiple documents with your team." A more natural Finnish phrasing would be more concise and flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tee yhteistyötä tiimisi kanssa yhden tai useamman dokumentin parissa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "共同編集する" (kyoudou henshuu suru) can sound a bit formal in this context. A more natural and user-friendly translation might emphasize collaboration rather than simply editing together.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: チームでドキュメントを一緒に作業する。(Chiimu de dokyumento o issho ni sagyou suru - Collaborate on documents with your team)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ຮ່ວມມືໃນເອກະສານໜຶ່ງ ຫຼືຫຼາຍເອກະສານກັບທີມງານຂອງທ່ານ' is a literal translation, but could be more natural and fluent in Lao. 'Collaborate on one or multiple documents with your team' implies a broader sense of working together, not just directly manipulating documents.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more idiomatic translation like 'ເຮັດວຽກຮ່ວມກັນກັບທີມງານຂອງທ່ານໃນເອກະສານໜຶ່ງເອກະສານຫຼືຫຼາຍກວ່າ' (Work together with your team on one document or more) or 'ເຮັດວຽກຮ່ວມກັບທີມງານຂອງທ່ານໃນການເຮັດເອກະສານ' (Work together with your team on documents).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Colaborați în documentul sau în mai multe documente cu echipa dvs' could be improved for clarity and flow. While grammatically correct, it sounds a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Colaborați la un document sau mai multe documente cu echipa dumneavoastră.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive pronoun 'dvs' (your) could be replaced with the more formal 'dumneavoastră' for consistency with standard Romanian usage in professional contexts.

The translation 'Совместная работа с командой над одним или несколькими документами ' is a literal translation and could be improved for natural flow in Russian. While technically correct, it sounds a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Совместная работа с командой над одним или несколькими документами

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබගේ කණ්ඩායම සමඟ ලේඛනයක හෝ කිහිපයක සහයෝගයෙන් වැඩ කරන්න' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. A more idiomatic translation would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ කණ්ඩායම සමඟ වැඩපත්‍රයක් හෝ කිහිපයක් gemeinsam වැඩ කරන්න (or) ඔබේ කණ්ඩායම සමඟ වැඩපත්‍රයක් හෝ කිහිපයක් සාමූහිකව කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Сарађуј на једном или више докумената са својим тимом' while understandable, isn't the most natural or accurate translation of 'Collaborate on one or multiple documents with your team'. The verb 'Сарађуј' (Saradjuj - Collaborate) is in the imperative mood, which isn't always the best choice. A more natural phrasing would imply a suggestion rather than a direct command.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Радите на једном или више докумената са својим тимом

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'тимом' (timom) is slightly less common than 'екипом' (ekipom) for 'team'. While both are correct, 'екипом' sounds more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Радите на једном или више докумената са својом екипом

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Sarađuj na jednom ili više dokumenata sa svojim timom' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Collaborate'. 'Sarađuj' implies cooperation, but 'collaborate' often suggests a more integrated and active working relationship. A better translation would emphasize this collaborative effort.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Radite zajedno na jednom ili više dokumenata sa svojim timom

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the Serbian word 'Sarađuj' is less commonly used than the more modern and widely understood 'Radite'. It sounds slightly archaic or formal in this context.
